title: osu! Tournament Map Recommender!
description: IRC Bot hosted on Render (GCP) that responds with tournament maps for osu! players.

title: Hawku Tablet Driver for Huion H950P
description: I added driver support for Hawku. This was possible by extracting the device code from the raw plug and plug drivers and writing a module for hawku to support my tablets.

title: Java Fighters
description: Fighting game written in Java. This was created by my project partner and I in highschool.

title: Personal Website
description: Written in React JS, Framer Motion, Web3Forms, and hosted on Firebase.
technologies: Node JS | React JS | GCP  Firebase

title: Weather App
description: Assynchronous Weather Updates from geo location or address provided.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Simple Tic Tac Toe game written in React JS. It uses Vite with typescript.
